definition: A tangible item or product that is typically bought, sold, or traded, often referring to physical goods rather than services. It is commonly used in the context of commerce, retail, and business transactions.

examples.german: Die Ware ist von hoher Qualität.
examples.english: The product is of high quality.

examples.german: Die Ware wird innerhalb von zwei Tagen geliefert.
examples.english: The goods will be delivered within two days.
